Key Match Events: England won by 10 wickets (with 24 balls remaining)
Alex Hales made a dream come true
Chris Jordan took out India's captain Rohit Sharma
Post-Match Reflections: England's game-breaking talent was all about doing the basics right
Defeat to Ireland lit a fire under this world-beating outfit
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's second highest score against India in a T20I while the field restrictions were on
